name: Anglerfish Feeding Frenzy
description:
Anglerfish Feeding Frenzy is a game about the anglerfish who live deeper and deeper below the sea surface. It happened to meet a fish school, and as every food is rare in the depths, it needs to feed itself quickly.

How to play

Try to eat 20 fish and fill the hunger bar as fast as you can. Use light to lure nearby fish. If you eat them, though, the others swiftly swim away. You can use dash to catch them quickly.

Controls
  • WASD - movement
  • Left mouse button - dash towards the cursor
  • Right mouse button - turn on the light
Acknowledgements

Anglerfish Feeding Frenzy was created during Ludum Dare 48 as a Compo entry, and its source code is publicly available on GitHub.
